name: Melinda The Herbalist
description:
In this game we follow Melinda in taking back the root of the server by using her plants to root into corrupted robots in a post-apocalyptic world where the robots has risen up and overtaken the world.

Controls: WSAD/arrow keys, LMB to shoot, use your mouse to aim, and X to change plant.

Note: I am waiting for stuffs to be fixed on itch before the embedded version can be played
